text:
March 7, I960
Mr. Bob Reed
WHA-TV
600 North Park
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bob*
This note is to remind you to send me a preview
print of numbers 36, 37 and 38 in the Audio-Visual
Course series. Now that I have taken care of the
request let me say it was a real pleasure to talk
with you again. Perhaps we will have the opportunity
to work together some day.
Lee has told me how well you all treated him
Airing his visit to the University. I*m sorry I
did not have the chance to sit down and look at
the entire series. Since I was trying to accomplish
a great many things in a few days this was one of
the pleasures I had to give up. I would like to have
a complete outline of the series if one is available,
I*m sure that a final report will be issued and if
you are making a list of "report moochers" tack my
name onto the bottom.
As I understand the lineup, 36, 37 and 38 deal
with radio and television. As you know, we are surÂ¬
veying the field of available material to go along
with our utilisation informational kits. If there
are any other programs in this series that you think
have some bearing on our work, I would appreciate
your setting them up for our previewing. I will be
able to use the films whenever they are available and
will undertake to return them immediately.
Cordially,
CRT/gvc
c.c. Harold Hill
Clair R. Tettemer
Director of School Programs
